snippet: Travelers can now apply at Dallas-Fort Worth International Airport for clearance to keep their shoes, belts and light jackets on while passing through security screening....

headline.print_headline: Faster Airport-Screening Program Expands to DFW
headline.main: Faster Airport-Screening Program Expands to DFW

lead_paragraph: Travelers can now apply at Dallas-Fort Worth International Airport for clearance to keep their shoes, belts and light jackets on while passing through security screening.
